title: List of cities in Maharashtra
text:
<a href="Maharashtra">Maharashtra</a> ( ), is a <a href="States%20and%20territories%20of%20India">state</a> in the <a href="West%20India">western</a> region of <a href="India">India</a>. It is a <a href="List%20of%20states%20and%20union%20territories%20of%20India%20by%20population">second-most populous</a> state after <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a> and <a href="List%20of%20states%20and%20territories%20of%20India%20by%20area">third largest state by area</a> in India. Maharashtra is the wealthiest state in India, contributing 15% of the country's industrial output and 13.3% of its GDP (2006–2007 figures).
Maharashtra is the world's second-most populous first-level administrative country sub-division. Were it a nation in its own right, Maharashtra would be the <a href="List%20of%20countries%20by%20population">world's tenth-most populous state</a>, followed by <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>. There are 41,000 villages and 378 urban centres in Maharashtra.
External links.
